name: Astero Inc.
description:
ASTERO INC. is a space mining simulation game where players will travel to a dystopian future in a tense competition for asteroid mining rights throughout the universe. Take on the role of a small business owner in an all-out fight against the mighty Black Corp.



THIS IS YOUR CHANCE TO CONTROL THE MINING SPACE INDUSTRY!

Master a game in which your skill as a player is as important as the upgrades you can acquire. Empty asteroids, make efficient logistic networks with your drones and bring back home every valuable liter of Material with the best rockets that Astero Inc. can afford.

Scan the deposits and rocks under the ground to extract every last liter of Material:



Build your base in the most efficient way:



Send the valuable Material to your base:




BUT REMEMBER... SPACE IS NOT SAFE!

Beware of the dangers of electricity overloads, solar storms or asteroid instability! Any little mistake can be your worst enemy. Improve your equipment and face the adversities of asteroid mining.

And above all... DON'T BREAK THE ASTEROID!



The road to take first place will not be easy, and you will need all the help you can find in a story mode with unforgettable characters that will accompany you on your adventure.

GET READY TO MASTER YOUR SKILLS!

Play the free mode to perfect your strategies or play quick games to improve your mining skills:



Check the different stores and buy important upgrades.

Discover a story set in a dystopian future where the mysterious Material has become the new currency and 3D printers can print anything.

Meet the fun characters in the story mode!

SO GEAR ON SPACE MINER! THESE ASTEROIDS WILL NOT WAIT FOR YOU!
